name: CALYX
description:
Over population has become an increasing issue on Earth.  They turned to the planet 'Vex', which was habitable for humans, but already had its own hostile inhabitants.  In an effort to clear them out, the humans sent nuclear bombs to wipe them out.  However, this only made them stronger.

Now it's your job as Earth's best soldier to clear up the mess and bring prosperity for the human race.

Submission for the Winter 2022 Buddy Jam
